summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mixed on Thursday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: March 30
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mixed on Thursday, with nine gaining and the other ten declining.
Bitcoin fell 1.5% to $27,962 by market close.
